title: Sri Lanka: What are the names of the ‘40,000 dead’ – Where did they live and where are their relatives?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – There appears to be a scramble among LTTE supporters to compete with each other as to whose guesstimates can embarrass the Sri Lankan Government and its Armed Forces. What is preposterous is that the sources for these guesstimates come from LTTE sources. Leaving aside the exaggerations behind these claims…
